page.title: 19Clubs
page.content: Every Tuesday from 7:30pm to 9:00pm, I go to Guides.There are many more Guides who go there, and there are three patrols.The patrols are all names of birds:Nightingales, Bullfinches and Swallows. Every Tuesday we have patrol time,games,and many more things.Patrol time is when your Patrol gets together to chat about what they are going to do in the future:Go camping,do cooking etc.Patrols take it in turns each week to decide what games to play.Our leader usually organises trips or treasure hunts in nice weather.When it is hot we often light a fire and cook over it,we also practise First Aid.We also learn different kinds of knots:Reef,Sheep Bend etc.Occasionally we have pop quiz's with the Scouts which is good fun!
